data.title: Death Angel
data.meta_description: Death Angel is an American thrash metal band from Daly City, California, initially active from 1982 to 1991 and again since 2001. Death Angel has released nine studio albums, two demo tapes, one box set and three live albums.
data.text:
Recorded and live streamed on May 22, 2021 in San Francisco's legendary Great American Music Hall during the pandemic lock down, The Bastard Tracks is a live collection of 15 deep cuts and rarely performed songs from Death Angel's catalog. Recording was handled by the bands long time sixth member...

Not every band can rise up to be musical legends, but every once in a while a group is able to exceed all expectations and define the boundaries of a genre. Among one of the youngest bands ever to storm the metal world, Death Angel have come to be known as one of the most influential bands to eme...
